name: weather-app--birch
description: A fun little project showcasing some skills
author: Craig Martin

scripts.demo: npm run setup && npm run demo-server
scripts.deployment: git checkout gh-pages && git fetch origin master && git reset --hard origin/master && npm run setup && mkdir -p temp_node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ temp_node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ && rm -rf README.md package.json .gitignore karma.conf.js node_modules/ scss/ test/ javascript/ && mkdir -p node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ && cp -r temp_node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ && rm -rf temp_node_modules && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy app' && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.clean-built-dirs: rm -rf weather-app--birch && rm -rf css && rm -rf compiledES6
scripts.build-scss: node-sass scss/main.scss css/app.css && npm run autoprefixer && npm run cssmin
scripts.watch: npm run watch-es6 && npm run watch-scss
scripts.build: npm run build-scss && npm run build-es6
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run karma
scripts.lint: npm run lint-app && npm run lint-tests && npm run lint-csscomb
scripts.dist: npm run clean-built-dirs && npm run make-static-dirs && npm run build
